contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox company | company_name = CHESF S.A. | company_logo = | company_type = [[Subsidiary]] | foundation = 1945 | location = [[Recife]], [[Brazil]] | key_people = Dilton da Conti Oliveira ([[CEO]]) | industry = [[Utilities]] | products = [[Electricity generation]] | revenue = | net_income = | num_employees = 5,535 | parent = [[Eletrobras]] | homepage = [http://www.chesf.gov.br www.chesf.gov.br] }} '''CHESF''' ('''C'''ompanhia '''H'''idro-'''E'''létrica do '''S'''ão '''F'''rancisco; São Francisco's Hydroelectric Company) generates and transmits [[electric power]] from [[hydroelectric]] plants to all of the cities in northeast of [[Brazil]]. The main source of energy is the [[São Francisco River]]. {{DEFAULTSORT:Chesf}} [[Category:Eletrobras]] [[Category:Companies based in Pernambuco]] {{Energy-company-stub}} {{Brazil-company-stub}}
